name: NEAppProxyFlow
desc: An abstract base class shared by NEAppProxyTCPFlow and NEAppProxyUDPFlow.

items.name: func open(withLocalEndpoint: NWHostEndpoint?, completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Opens the flow, indicating to the system that the caller is ready to start receiving and sending data.

items.name: func closeReadWithError(Error?)
items.desc: Close the flow for further read operations.

items.name: func closeWriteWithError(Error?)
items.desc: Close the flow for further write operations.

items.name: var metaData: NEFlowMetaData
items.desc: An NEFlowMetaData object containing information about the source app of the flow.
